name: AOE: Area Of Effect
description:
A simple game made in ~3 hours for Trijam #160.

Theme: Life in a box

Screenshots:


How To Play:

  • Use WASD keys or left stick on controller to move
  • Avoid red boxes
  • Transparent red boxes will appear to guide you
  • Difficulty and speed will increase over time
  • [ SPACE BAR ] to restart
  • [ X ] to hide menu
  • enjoy :)
